name: Colin A. Raffel
content: Colin Raffel Colin Raffel Associate Processor of Computer Science, University of Toronto Associate Research Director, Vector Institute Faculty Researcher, Hugging Face Bios of various shapes and sizes My lab works on decentralizing, democratizing, and de-risking large-scale AI. Current members include: Marco Ciccone BoglÃ¡rka Ecsedi Malikeh Ehghaghi Gyung Hyun Je GÃ¼l Sena AltintaÅ Brian Lester Haokun Liu Nikhil Kandpal Derek Tam Michael Matena Noah Juravsky Katherine Lambert Interested in joining? Great! Fill out this form (no need to contact me separately). For an up-to-date list of publications, check arXiv. I try to keep this YouTube playlist up-to-date with recordings of my talks. If that's not enough for you, my complete CV is available here. I occasionally blog.
